user.name: Michele Russo
user.bio: I am a graduate Computer Engineering student with a strong passion for Deep Learning and all its applications in Space, Computer Vision, and Biology.

node.name: LFN_Project
node.description: The aim of this project is to discuss how the brain changes in different diseases by representing the brain as a network and then applying meaningful metrics to report features that can underline the impact of the disease on the whole brain network. The focus is on neuropsychiatric disorders such as bipolar disorder, ADHD, and schizophrenia.

node.name: Sport-Players-Detect-Segment
node.description: Sport players detection and segmentation, playing field segmentation. Project for the Computer Vision Course

node.name: Style_Transfer
node.description: The goal of style transfer is to create an image that preserves the content of the original image while applying the visual style of another image
